thread.title: Bulgarian cat walks again with the help of bionic legs
thread.title_full: Bulgarian cat walks again with the help of bionic legs

author: Nikolay Nikolov
title: Bulgarian cat walks again with the help of bionic legs
text:
Social Good Summit Bulgarian cat walks again with the help of bionic legs 
Pooh, a one-year-old cat from Bulgaria was found without his hind legs. But a local animal shelter raised funds to have him fitted with prosthetics legs 
The Bulgarian vet who performed Pooh's surgery also fitted three more cats. The procedure was first performed in the U.K. but this is the first in Europe. Nikolay Nikolov
